name: Cash Horse - Match 3 Puzzle Adventure
description:
Feature of game:
  • Adventure with the rotation of the level
  • Collect crystals three in a row
  • Convenient control
  • Challenging levels
  • Physics
  • Thorns
  • Traps.

The main Horse named "Cash" in a protective suit.
Cash is very fond of crystals and is able to jump and rotate the level
